header_desc: Crafted with passion… and tiny paws
header_desc_about: Learn the story behind the Skórat brand
header_desc_contact: Have any questions? Feel free to reach me out!
header_story_1: My name is Mr. Rattler – a rat with many talents!
header_story_2: I came from Belarus and settled in Poland. At first, I lived in the forests and swamps, but over time, I made my way to Warsaw. There, I met a man, and I made his apartment my home.
header_story_3: For a while, it worked… but then he started grumbling that he had had enough of a freeloader. I didn’t want to be a burden, so I decided to learn something. That’s when I discovered leathercraft – and for almost two years now, I’ve been creating practical and beautiful leather goods with my own paws.
header_story_4: Each piece I create is the result of my passion, precision, and resourceful nature
intro_text: I create unique natural leather goods that combine elegance, functionality, and passion… passed from paw to paw.
highlight_text: I am Mr. Rattler – a small, nimble craftsman! Leather doesn't intimidate me, because I’m the one turning them into wallets, belts, and other little wonders. Each piece is the result of patient pecking, cutting, and stitching – until the fur bristles!
gallery-preview_title: 🧵 Take a look at my works
gallery-preview_text: No need to rummage through the attic – you’ll find my latest and favorite creations right here. Elegant, stylish, and with a touch of claw.
call-to-action_title: 📬 Do you have a question or want something unusual?
call-to-action_text: Get in touch with me through the contact or send a message – even if you want a wallet shaped like cheese, I can make it happen!
note: 🐾 Note: Each piece may vary slightly – after all, every paw leaves a unique mark.
main_contact_desc: The best way to reach me is via:
